messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] debbie
messages.msgSnippet: To Kolleen and the others who took the time to post in response to my concerns about my 14yo, thank you very much. I really appreciate it. Your knowledge and
messages.messageBody:
To Kolleen and the others who took the time to post in response to my concerns about my 14yo, thank you very much. I really appreciate it. Your knowledge and support mean a lot!
Debbie
Kolleen <Kolleen@...> wrote: >debbie wrote:
>I have spoken to my son. I know exactly what he wants to do and has for
>years, computer programming. I told him today that I'm leaving him in
>charge of what he wants to do, and he chose another programming course.


debbie,
this is wonderful! and i'm so glad you support him. as mimi said, he's
lucky to have a mom like you.

have a great trip and good luck in the new year.

kolleen
